componentLibrary.name: PhyloSpec Core
componentLibrary.description: Canonical phylogenetic modeling components from PhyloSpec with dimension expressions and taxa handling - Updated to match Java type system

types.name: Distribution
types.description: Abstract type representing a probability distribution

generatedType.description: The type of value this distribution generates

first.description: The first element of the pair.

second.description: The second element of the pair.

types.name: SquareMatrix
types.description: Square matrix with equal number of rows and columns

types.name: Simplex
types.description: Probability vector with elements that sum to 1.0

types.name: Sequence
types.description: Biological sequence with elements from alphabet A

nBranches.description: Number of branches (2n-2 for rooted tree)

nInternalNodes.description: Number of internal nodes (n-1 for rooted tree)

ntax.description: Number of taxa in the set

types.name: Alignment
types.description: Multiple sequence alignment with extractable properties

dataType.description: Type of data (nucleotide, amino acid, etc.)

generators.name: IID
generators.description: Vector of independent and identically distributed random variables

generators.name: Mixture
generators.description: Mixture of distributions with the same return type

arguments.name: components
arguments.description: Component distributions that all generate type T

generators.name: LogNormal
generators.description: Log-normal distribution for positive real values

arguments.name: meanlog
arguments.description: Mean of the distribution in log space

generators.name: Gamma
generators.description: Gamma distribution for positive real values

generators.name: PhyloBM
generators.description: Phylogenetic Brownian motion for the continuous evolution of a single trait

generators.name: PhyloOU
generators.description: Phylogenetic Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process for a univariate trait with selection

arguments.name: meanlog
arguments.description: Mean of the distribution in log space

arguments.name: components
arguments.description: Component distributions that all generate type T

generators.name: UncorrelatedLognormal
generators.description: UCLN clock model for branch rates

arguments.name: interleaved
arguments.description: Whether the file is in interleaved format

generators.name: ntaxa
generators.description: Get number of taxa in an alignment

generators.name: nchar
generators.description: Get number of characters/sites in an alignment

generators.name: dataType
generators.description: Get the data type of an alignment

generators.name: subset
generators.description: Extract a subset of sites from an alignment

generators.name: taxonset
generators.description: Create a taxon set from taxon names

generators.name: mrca
generators.description: Find most recent common ancestor of taxa

generators.name: zip
generators.description: Takes two vectors and creates a new vector with each pair. Requires the two vectors to be of the same size.

arguments.name: first
arguments.description: The first vector to zip up

arguments.name: second
arguments.description: The second vector to zip up
